reviewText: I knew when I purchased this DvD online I'd need to change the region on my DvD player, so no problem. I wasn't aware though that 75% of the dialogue was in German, so that was a disappointment.

Candid look at the Berlin Phil's tour of the Far East including comments from several musicians who were going through their probationary period with the Orchestra.  Very interesting.  The reception they received from their young fans in Taiwan was something to behold.
